generic.other_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
generic.login_error: Unable to login with provided credentials.
generic.unable_to_login: Unable to login with provided credentials.
generic.invalid_org_or_desk: Invalid organization or desk serial number. Do you want to proceed with guest account?
generic.new_organization_assigned: You need to login again to use the desk.
generic.desk_not_registered: Desk is not registered. Do you want to proceed with guest account?
generic.bluetooth_off: Bluetooth is powered off. Please enable it on the phone settings.
generic.error_code_14: Please ensure that you did unpair the device in the bluetooth settings and as well the device is on pairing mode.
generic.ble_connection_error: Unable to pair device. Please try again.
generic.invalid_pin_code: Invalid pin code. Please try again and make the sure the device is on pairing mode.
generic.error_code_15: Failed to establish the connection, the connection has timed out unexpectedly. Please remove the device in the settings and try to pair again.
generic.desk_adjusted: Your preset heights are outside the range available at this workstation. Your height settings have been adjusted to the closest available height.
generic.invalid_session: Your session has a timeout. Please log in again.
generic.desk_is_booked: The desk is currently booked. Please wait for the desk to be available or you can use another desk.
generic.desk_disabled: The desk is currently disabled due to an incoming booking.
generic.desk_has_incoming_booking: The desk has an incoming booking by
generic.clean_desk: Please clean the desk before and after use.

success.title: Success!
success.signup_message: Please check your email to activate your account.
success.survey_success: We have received your response, continue to update to improve your health.
success.sync_data: Connected, please wait while we update your data.

permissions.title: Notice
permissions.bluetooth_permission: Please allow the PulseEcho app to access the bluetooth service in your phone settings privacy section.

login.account_locked: Your account is temporarily locked. CLick on forgot password to reset.
login.no_user: Your email should be associated with organization. Please contact support.
login.activate_resend_code: Please check your registered email for the activation code.

forgot.email_content: Send reset code to my email.
forgot.success_request_pincode: Please check your email for the reset password code.
forgot.success_reset_password: Password has been reset, please login with your email and password.

home.title: Home
home.manual_notifier: Weâ€™ve noticed that your desk has been inactive for too long. To achieve the most benefit from your Smartpods workstation, we recommend you move at least twice each hour.
home.safety_message: Please ensure that there are no obstacles around and under the desk.

deskHeight.title: Height Settings
deskHeight.set_standing_error: The standing position needs to be greater than the sit position.
deskHeight.set_sitting_error: The sitting position needs to be greater than the stand position.
deskHeight.sit_stand_diff_error: The difference between sitting and standing must be greater than
deskHeight.both_adjusted: Sitting and standing height has been adjusted

options_password_change.success_password_changed: Password has been changed, please login again.

app_version.title: Software Version
app_version.version_desc: Warning: This computer program is protected by copyright law and international treaties. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution of this program, or any portion of it, may result in severe civil and criminal penalties, and will be prosecuted to the maximum extent possible under the law.

logout.title: Logout
logout.desc1: Logging out will direct you to the login screen.

calorie.title: Estimated calorie expenditure
calorie.content: This is the estimated number of calories that you will be burning while using Smartpods.

bmr.title: Basal Metabolic Rate
bmr.content: Basal metabolic rate (BMR) is the amount of energy expanded while at rest.

activity_profile.title: Activity Profile
activity_profile.profile_not_updated: Profile not update. Please try again.

desk_mode.title: Desk Mode
desk_mode.auto_desc: Runs through the activity cycle without the need of user acknowledgement.
desk_mode.manual_desc: Runs through the activity cycle manually.
desk_mode.interactive_desc: Runs through the activity cycle with the need of user acknowledgement.

box_controls.safety_alert: Changing the safety sensitivity could affect the functioning and safety of the user working at this desk. Do want to change the safety values?

hear_progress.heart_fills_up: You have added progress in your heart, keep up the good work.

survey.title: Survey
survey.message: New survey available. Do you want to proceed?
survey.no_answers: Survey questions are not answered. Please go over and update each question.

covid.title: Covid 19 Assessment
covid.message: Please answer the following questions of Covid 19 health assessment.
covid.not_enough_answers_message: Covid19 questions are not completed. Please go over and update each question.

geofencing.not_supported: Geofencing is not supported on this device!
geofencing.not_permitted: Your geotification is saved but will only be activated once you grant allow permission to access the device location.
